api_auth.description: The security definitions for this API. Please check individual operations for applicable scopes.

scopes.https://api.ebay.com/oauth/api_scope/com: View a user's personal address information from their eBay member account
View a user's personal email information from their eBay member account
View a user's first and last name from their eBay member account
View a user's personal telephone information from their eBay member account
View a user's basic information, such as username or business account details, from their eBay member account
View a user's eBay member account status

apiDescription:
Note: Not all the account related fields are returned for an authenticated user. The fields returned in the response are controlled by the scopes and are available only to select developers approved by business units.

Retrieves the authenticated user's account profile information. It can be used to let users log into your app or site using eBay, which frees you from needing to store and protect user's PII (Personal Identifiable Information) data.
